artist: Artist: John Laughlin; Publisher: Sherwood Press, Toronto
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Sewn stitched binding with tape reinforcement, color offset lithographic image of female figure collaged to cardboard covers, with inscriptions in black ink pen; 8 pp.
inscription: Inside of rear cover, blue ink marker: SHERWOOD PRES / (signiture) / 2002
medium: Black ink pen, watercolor wash, color offset lithographic collage; bound volume
signed: Inside of rear cover, blue ink marker: Laughlin
title: The Seven Deadly Sins
